label: 三会
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Also Sandai chokue 三大勅会.  The Vimalakīrti Service at the Kōfukuji (yuimae), the Suvarnaprabhāsa Service at the Imperial Palace (misaie), and the Suvarnaprabhāsa Service at the Yakushiji (saishōe) were annual events sponsored by the Court to protect the state (p. 747n). [興福寺、維摩会、御斎会、薬師寺、最勝会]
